entities.name: Articque
entities.description: A specialist provider of Location Intelligence (LI) analytics solutions and a pure-play software platform provider focused on unlocking critical insights from geo-data analysis. Articque cumulates several decades of experience in developing innovative geospatial data-led solutions. Articque’s pure-play and best-of-breed approach has propelled the company in the top-3 LI platform providers in France.
keyStrengths: Several decades of experience in developing innovative geospatial data-led solutions
Top-3 LI platform providers in France
Cloud-based, powerful and scalable LI Platform

entities.name: Location Intelligence (LI) analytics solutions
entities.description: Solutions that transform geospatial data into strategic insights to solve a variety of use cases and business challenges, improve productivity, data experience, decision-making and innovation, and empower clients’ strategies to drive growth opportunities, operational excellence and competitive edge.

entities.name: LI Platform
entities.description: A cloud-based, powerful and scalable Location Intelligence Platform embracing a wide spectrum of analytics requirements. Designed to accommodate any user, leveraging a unique proprietary no-code modeling approach to facilitate LI application development and access by non-technical resources.

entities.name: CDO (Cartes & Données Online)
entities.description: The cloud-native version of the LI platform (e3_pg6) designed for SMEs requiring a limited number of seats.

entities.name: AP (Articque Platform)
entities.description: The self-hosted version of CDO (e4_pg6) with identical features, fitted for larger companies.

entities.name: GeoCodage
entities.description: A geocoding tool to convert large volume datasets of addresses into geographic coordinates.

entities.name: GeoService Data
entities.description: An enabling tool to tap into a wide range of third-party databases offering socio-demographic data.

entities.name: Carticque Basemaps
entities.description: Provides a range of third-party domestic and international basemaps including administrative or business-specific basemaps.

entities.name: Location Intelligence (LI)
entities.description: Technology and methods for analyzing geospatial data to derive insights. Intersects with Business Intelligence (BI), Consulting, Geographic Information System (GIS), and Extract-Transform Load (ETL).

entities.name: Geospatial Data Analysis
entities.description: The process of examining, interpreting, and modeling geographic data to uncover patterns, trends, and insights.

entities.name: No-code modeling
entities.description: A unique proprietary approach that facilitates LI application development and access by non-technical resources.
Number of client companies/organizations.

entities.characteristics: Articque is in the top-3 LI platform providers in France.

entities.name: Strategic Insight Generation from Geospatial Data
entities.description: Transform geospatial data into strategic insights to solve a variety of use cases and business challenges.

entities.name: Productivity and Decision-Making Improvement
entities.description: Improve productivity, data experience, decision-making and innovation by delivering superior intelligence.

entities.name: Client Strategy Acceleration
entities.description: Empower and accelerate clients’ strategies to drive growth opportunities, operational excellence and competitive edge.

entities.name: LI Application Development
entities.description: Facilitate LI application development, particularly for non-technical resources.

entities.name: Smarter Data Preparation and Enrichment
entities.description: Use cases supported by complementary modules like GeoCodage and GeoService Data.

entities.name: Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs)
entities.description: Target market for CDO (Cartes & Données Online) requiring a limited number of seats.

entities.name: Larger Companies
entities.description: Target market for AP (Articque Platform).
